title: COMMANDER KEEN 3D TECH DEMOS
content:
Uhh, Its to much to host on my site... could Xtravase hook me up with some space? Anyway....

IT CONTAINS THE FOLLOWING:

*walking test (you walk your player around)

*camera test (soon to be updated but you basicly mave left and right staring into a desert)

I have other 3D games waiting which will be in the misc. forums when complete___________________________________________

title: Re: COMMANDER KEEN 3D TECH DEMOS
content:
I know I am bringing back a REALLY old thread, something I am opposed to doing myself. But since BP seems to have returned I thought I'd ask:

What happened to this? Did you eve finish the tech demo? I know it didn't sound like you had much, BP, even if you finished it, but it sounds like you had something, even if it wasn't Keen at it's current state.
